remarks: The projective map of the orthocomplement of the join of two lattice elements.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pmapocj.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapocj.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
pmapocj.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
pmapocj.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
pmapocj.f $e |- F = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapocj.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
pmapocj.r $e |- N = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
pmapocjN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( F ` ( ._|_ ` ( X .\/ Y ) ) ) = ( N ` ( ( F ` X ) .+ ( F ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
